title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, July 7, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of American genetics pioneer Nettie Stevens (1861) who discovered that the combinations XX and XY in chromosomes determined the sex of an organism.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of American genetics pioneer Nettie Stevens (1861) who discovered that the combinations XX and XY in chromosomes determined the sex of an organism.
